detail_desc: Canvas trainers with a hook and loop fastener, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Hat in a ribbed wool-blend knit containing some cashmere with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a print motif.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.
Tights with glittery spots and an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Low-cut swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck with a gathered seam down the front for a draped effect and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Leggings in soft cotton and viscose jersey with a wide, foldover panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline and long sleeves.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6//7/8 plus.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Soft glasses case with an opening on one short side. Size 8x17 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Relaxed-fit top in linen jersey with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves and a knot detail at the hem.
Leotard in glossy jersey with a print motif, 3/4-length sleeves, a glittery elastic waistband and a skirt in two layers of tulle. Detachable wings at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Large shopper in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16.5x30x30 cm.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, embroidered bodice and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Long sleeves with flounced cuffs.
Glittery metal hairclips. Length 5 cm.
Lace briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long cape in jersey with a high collar and tab with a hook and loop fastening at the neck.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Hat in a jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a pompom on the top, earflaps and braided ties. Fleece lining.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, decorative seam down the front, gathered, front-facing shoulder seams and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and shimmering imitation leather pendant.
Low-rise joggers in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered side seams and a zip at the hems.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Double-layered scarves in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with chunky, patterned soles. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave.
Knee-length shorts in sturdy twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Wedge-heel sandals with a decorative bow at the front, an ankle strap with an adjustable fastener and braided jute trims around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 13 cm.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline, short raglan sleeves and smocking around the neckline, sleeves and hem..
Trousers in an airy weave with side pockets, a high waist with elasticated smocking at the back and extra-wide legs.

Quilted, lightly padded nylon jacket with a lined drawstring hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, concealed drawstring, side pockets and mesh side panels in a contrasting colour. Reflective details.

Short, cold shoulder wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, short flounced sleeves and ties at the side. Flounce at the top that continues around the back, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Mesh trainers with rubber and imitation leather details, a padded edge and lacing at the front. Decorative grosgrain trim with a text print along the tongue and back of the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a small, sewn-on fabric label at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjama playsuit in soft satin with a V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Wide, V-neck sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with decorative straps at the neckline, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle with a shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long, fine-knit sleeves and striped ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, large buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, side pockets and a gently rounded hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, decorative zips at the top, back pockets and slim legs.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and tapered legs.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front with ties at one side. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood that has a raw-edge seam at the top. Low dropped shoulders and long, straight sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured jersey T-shirt in a soft cotton blend.

Patterned softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, reflective details and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with elastication at the top and overlocked, scalloped edges. Extra low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in pima cotton with jersey ribbing around the neckline.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.
Bag in grained imitation leather with a metal-chain and imitation leather shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 17x25 cm.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative studs and openings at the knees.
Platform trainers in imitation suede with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Long-sleeved top in soft, airy slub jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
